name: ts-monorepo-template
description: A template for building a monorepo typescript app
author: Andrew Kirkegaard

scripts.start: yarn prestart && DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 docker-compose --file docker-compose.yaml up --build
scripts.pretest: DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 docker-compose --file docker-compose.test.yaml build && docker-compose --file docker-compose.test.yaml down
scripts.test: yarn pretest && docker-compose --file docker-compose.test.yaml run --rm sut
